name: Explorer's Fold
description: An old folded map with ink scribbles and magical markers, spread on a worn stone table, surrounded by rope, compass, and a dagger. An old companion patched countless times yet never fails.
description_ch: 一張帶有墨水塗鴉和魔法標記的舊摺疊地圖，被攤開在磨損的石桌上，旁邊放著繩索、指南針和一把匕首。縫補無數次卻從不出錯的老夥伴。
